data.eml:eml: Cylindrocladiella hahajimaensis, a new species of Cylindrocladiella transferred from Verticillium

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Inderbitzin, Patrik, Bostock, Richard M., Subbarao, Krishna V. (2012): Cylindrocladiella hahajimaensis, a new species of Cylindrocladiella transferred from Verticillium. MycoKeys 4: 1-8, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.4.2619, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/mycokeys.4.2619
